#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    unsigned long long n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu",&n);
        if(n%7==0)
        printf("%llu\n",n);
        else if(n%7==4)
        printf("%llu\n",n-4);
        else if(n%7==2&&n>=16)
        printf("%llu\n",n-16);
         else if(n%7==3&&n>=24)
        printf("%llu\n",n-24);
         else if(n%7==5&&n>=12)
        printf("%llu\n",n-12);
        else if(n%7==6&&n>=20)
        printf("%llu\n",n-20);
        else if(n%7==1&&n!=1)
        printf("%llu\n",n-8);
        else
        printf("-1\n");
       
    }
     //printf("%lld\n",999999980%7);
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
